descp2: int > 1 or float between 0 and 1 The same as the min_samples given to OPTICS. Up and down steep regions can't have more then ``min_samples`` consecutive non-steep points. Expressed as an absolute number or a fraction of the number of samples (rounded to be at least 2).

int > 1 or float between 0 and 1 The same as the min_samples given to OPTICS. Up and down steep regions can't have more then ``min_samples`` consecutive non-steep points. Expressed as an absolute number or a fraction of the number of samples (rounded to be at least 2).
